content: + 4 corner fpdctog the texture slip_stitch into next chain 2 space chain 3 18 11 v sts per side + 4 corner v-sts ​ double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in same chain space *fpdc2tog 19 11 shells per side 12 fpdctog per ​ around last leg of this v_stitch and first leg of side 4 corner shells next v_stitch 2dc chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space shell made repeat from * around fpc2tog slip_stitch into the top of the starting chain place a stitch marker in each round 20 slip_stitch to chain 1 space of next shell round 26 note be careful not to miss the ​ chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet in same space first st after each corner the final loop *4 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space repeat from * to of the last star st will be worked in the the corner shell 3 half_double_crochet in first chain 1 space corner spaces chain 3 insert hook in second ​ half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet between the 2 center double_crochet 3 chain of chain 3 and draw up a loop insert hook in half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space repeat from * 3rd chain and draw up a loop insert hook in chain around slip_stitch to the top of the starting chain space and draw up a loop insert hook in fasten_off 52 half_double_crochet per side next st and draw up a loop insert hook in next st and draw up a loop yo and draw section 3 through all 6 loops on hook chain 1 *insert hook in eye made with the chain st draw up round 21 join yarn in any chain 2 corner loop insert hook in leg of last st and draw ​ space chain 1 2 single_crochet in corner space *working up a loop insert hook in same st as last st in the third loop at the back of the half_double_crochet single_crochet in and draw up a loop draw up loops in next 2 each st to corner 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in corner sts yo and draw through all loops on hook space repeat from * around ending with 2 repeat from * to the corner double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the top of first single_crochet to join 56 the corner repeat for all sides ending with single_crochet per side double_crochet in corner space chain 1 single_crochet in the top of chain 3 to join turn 36 star sts + 2 double_crochet per side ​ ​ round 22 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in ​ same space half_double_crochet in each st 1 half_double_crochet chain 2 2hdc in corner space note that the ​ corner stitch counts are different repeat ​ for all sides ending with half_double_crochet chain 1
